description: An extension that allows issuers to add signature lines to the visual representation of the badge. This is not part of the cryptographic proof; it is for display purposes only.
title: SignatureLine schema

anyOf.description: An image representative of the entity. In Blockcerts this is typically a data URI (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Data_URI_scheme) embedded as a base-64 encoded PNG image, but it may also be a URI where the image may be found.
IRI (typically HTTP) representing this signature image.
